pros: Combo class that allows you to link skills together
Attacks have many lines especially with Arc Charger (4th Job) that essentially doubles the number of lines you deal

4th Job Mobbing skill Thunderbolt has a tall hitbox that can hit multiple platforms
  • As well with Typhoon (4th Job) and its 3rd Job variant Gale
Cygnus Knight characters do not need Mastery Books
cons: Long cooldown on main buffs such as Arc Charger (4th Job), Primal Bolt (Hyper Skill) and Lightning Cascade (5th Job) especially if you die
Linking Skills consists of alternating between 2 skills which may be exhausting after prolonged playing

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Damage: 5% + (up to 35% from Gale/Typhoon)
Final Damage: (100% from Lightning Elemental) + (20% on Linked Attacks)
Ignore DEF: (+45% from Lightning Elemental)

details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Hawkeye to become a Thunder Breaker

details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete a series of quests in 4th Job

fifthMain.name: Lightning Cascade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Grants Final Damage +9% for 42 sec. Initial Damage: 600%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 6. Send forth a traveling lightning bolt.
The damage it deals decreases with each enemy it attacks, and it can hit up to 4 nearby enemies in a row
When only one bolt triggers, it becomes a more powerful version, dealing 800% damage 7 times.
Lightning Spawn Cooldown: 3 sec
Skill Cooldown: 108 sec
fifthMain.desc: When active, your attacks creates a chain of lightning that bounces to nearby enemies
details: The lightning damage is reduced for each enemy it travels through
Deals increased %Damage if only one enemy is hit
Additionally grants a %Final Damage buff
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Shark Torpedo
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Consumes 2 Lightning Charges.\nFires a deadly spirit-shark that deals 2000% damage 7 times to up to 15 enemies.\nCooldown: 8 sec
fifthMain.desc: Sends out a shark that rips through enemies in front of you
details: Consumes 2 stacks of
Can be linked with all skills except
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Lightning God Spear Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500
A divine trident is summoned after 8 linked attacks land successfully.
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 6
Afterwards, activates Lightning at set intervals 4 times, which hits up to 8 enemies for 400% damage 7 times.
Cooldown: 7 sec
fifthMain.desc: Every 8 successful Linked Attacks, a trident launches from the ground damaging nearby enemies
details: The trident deals damage as it launches up and after it launches up

fifthMain.name: Lightning Spear Multistrike
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 60 sec, Max Combo Attacks: 12
Combo Attack: Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 750%, Number of Attacks: 5. When hit, Max Lightnings: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 4. Lightning activates in different places.
Final combo attacks up to 7 enemies with 1200% damage 7 times. When hit, activates large lightning that attacks up to 8 eneemies with 1450% damage 6 times
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Strikes violently around you and causes lightning to strike from above

Can be used up to 12 times before going on cooldown
The final strike deals increased %Damage
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Thunder Breaker is STR warrior class part of the Cygnus Knights. Thunder Breakers are known for their unique combo attack playstyle
